artist: Lithographer: Gustav Wolff; Painter: After Bartolommeo Ramenghi
description: madonna seated on a cloud supported by cherubs, holding child; standing below are Saints Geminianus, Peter, Paul, and Anthony
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscriptions

on sheet below image in black:[Gemalt von Bartholo Ramenghi gen. Bagnacavallo    Lithographirt von G. Wolff in Dresden/ MADONNA VON BAGNACAVALLO./ (Dresdener Galerie)/ 83]  in pencil on sheet:[1-65]; in pencil on verso upper right corner: [89]
title: Madonna Von Bagnacavallo
